meanings.sent1: I need to resew the button on my shirt.
meanings.sent2: She had to resew the hem of her dress after it came undone.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally cut the thread, so now I have to resew it.
meanings.sent4: Her love for sewing was so strong, she would resew any torn fabric.
meanings.sent5: The tailor had to resew the seams to make the dress fit perfectly.

meanings.sent1: After the accident, she had to resew the torn fabric.
meanings.sent2: He carefully resewed the torn teddy bear for his little sister.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy robot tried to resew its own wires but got them all tangled.
meanings.sent4: The community came together to resew the bonds that had been broken.
meanings.sent5: The doctor had to resew the patient's wound to ensure proper healing.
